overview:
Suresh Mathai is a senior management executive with a deep and extensive background and expertise in direct marketing/advertising as well as software/ technology. His broad experience ranges from start-ups to multinational corporations in the US and the Asia Pacific region. He co-founded, built and sold two technology companies, and has worked as President/CEO of two multinational companies that he built into formidable operations in the Asia Pacific region. He currently serves on the Board of Directors of the DMA (Direct Marketing Association) and IDEX (International Development Exchange). He is also Chairman & Co-founder of ThinkDimensions, Inc.

SPECIALTIES • Digital & Direct Marketing/Mobile/Search/Email • Data & Analytics • Marketing Technologies • Product & Solution Design Software Development • P&L and Operations Management • International/Asia Pacific Management

PROFILE • 20+ years’ experience and expertise across the spectrum of Marketing Services as well as Software/Technology businesses. • Track record of building businesses and driving top & bottom-line results – from entrepreneurial start-ups to matrixed multinational corporations like J Walter Thompson (WPP) & Rapp Collins (Omnicom). • Client experience includes leading global and national brands: Citibank, Diners Club, IBM, Mercedes Benz, Ford, Staples, Kraft, Unilever, Northwest Airlines, Singapore Airlines, AOL, Intuit, Cisco, etc. • Domestic and international business background with deep experience across the Asia Pacific region. • Serve on the Board of Directors of the DMA, the preeminent industry association; widely networked in the industry in the US as well as internationally.
